GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
Revert "usb: typec: ucsi: add a common function ucsi_unregister_connectors()"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 3d4044c9e6d2e3f11f1f8b5e0ee8647d3eb1afad, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 87d0e2f41b8cc2018499be4e8003fa8c09b6f2fb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Revert "usb: typec: ucsi: add a common function ucsi_unregister_connectors()"
